oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Sgt. Charles Ward, Co. E, 60th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA to his mother
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charles' furlough was determined by lottery, and he will start home in about 18 days. He has been thinking about mother's blackberry cordial. Charley tells her that his Federal regiment (60th Ind. Inf.""had to scheedadal [skeedaddle] from the rebels." The Rebels and locals "don't like the yankes [sic] very much."
